name: cue-for-chrome
description: Chrome extension for real-time AI scaffolding with invisible overlay UI

scripts.build: tsc --noEmit && vite build && cp manifest.json dist/ && cp -r public/* dist/
scripts.reload: chokidar 'dist/**/*' -c 'osascript -e "tell application \"Google Chrome Canary\" to tell the active tab of its first window to reload"'
